title: Instructional Design Practical Competency Enhancement: Advanced Social Context Learning Through Virtual Reality Learning Environments (VRLE)

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners enhance their ability to analyze social variables by reconstructing historical events in VR environments

Over six months, learners analyze at least two complex social issues (climate change, poverty, educational inequality) using immersive simulation platforms (e.g., Minecraft Education Edition, SimCity EDU), write an evaluation report (5+ pages) reflecting stakeholder perspectives, and improve strategies at least twice based on peer feedback.
Participants confirm the applicability of VR-based collaborative tasks in real-world social contexts by achieving at least 85% completion.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
